Name: Raita Cocktail
Instructions: MUDDLE cardamom, cumin and then cucumber in base of shaker. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Fresh cucumber, mint and yoghurt with a hint of cardamom and cumin spice, laced with vodka.
History: Created in 2011 by yours truly (Simon Difford) at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
